item.title: Day 3 schedule
item.description: Today’s Topics: Delay-embedding Phase/State space reconstruction Recurrence Quantification Analysis Early Warning Signals (EWS) of phase transitions Tentative time table for Day 3 When What Who Topics Notes 09.00-10.30 Quantifying temporal patterns in unordered categorical time series data FH Categorical Auto-Recurrence Quantification Analysis 10.30-11.00 Coffee/Tea 11.00-12.00 Assignments Categorical RQA, Surrogate analysis 12.
